definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: The fuel and oxidizer are kerosene and liquid oxygen, respectively .
sentences.chinese: 燃燒劑和氧化劑分別爲煤油和液氧。

sentences.english: The influence factors of testing dispersity of oil-based incendiary agent are also discussed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 討論了油基燃燒劑分散性測試的影響因素。

sentences.english: The nature of the fuel gas affects the flame flashback.
sentences.chinese: 燃燒劑氣體的特性對火焰反閃有影響。

sentences.english: The polydiene basic molecular structure is an excellent fuel .
sentences.chinese: 聚二烯基本分子結構是一良好的燃燒劑。

sentences.english: These are also known as stimulant fat burners.
sentences.chinese: 他們也被稱爲刺激性脂肪燃燒劑。

sentences.english: Well, fat burners are basically stimulants.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，脂肪燃燒劑基本上都是興奮劑。
